meanings.definition: To emerge again or resurface after a period of absence or obscurity.
meanings.sent1: After years of hiding, the sun reemerged from behind the clouds.
meanings.sent2: The flowers reemerging in spring brought color back to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was to make a coin reemerge from behind the child's ear.
meanings.sent4: Her smile reemerged like a ray of sunshine after a storm.
meanings.sent5: The memories of childhood reemerging filled her heart with warmth.

meanings.definition: The act of reappearing or becoming prominent once more.
meanings.sent1: The reemerging of the comet was a rare celestial event.
meanings.sent2: The reemerging of vintage fashion trends delighted many fashion enthusiasts.
meanings.sent3: The reemerging of the long-lost recipe for apple pie caused a baking frenzy in the town.
meanings.sent4: The reemerging of the old building's grandeur was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The reemerging of the artist's talent captivated the audience.
